p: The results of the comparisons of 2010 and NO X are presented in the Supplementary File 1, which showed similar tendencies ( Supplementary Figure S2â€“Supplementary Figure S4). The sectors [e.g. transport and building (residential and commercial)] presented different pictures ( Supplementary Figure S5 and Supplementary Figure S6), with large discrepancies in absolute terms and modest discrepancies on a logarithmic scale. Overall, the R 2 values were low, likely due to discrepancies between the base data (CEDS and EDGAR), of which the reliability cannot currently be easily assessed.
